data.Title: Microsoft Combats Deepfakes and Non-Consensual Intimate Images on Bing
data.Description: Microsoft has partnered with StopNCII to remove non-consensual intimate images, including deepfakes, from its Bing search engine. This initiative aims to protect individuals from the harmful spread of such content online.

data.Title: Google August 2024 Core Update Completed: Impact and Analysis
data.Description: The Google August 2024 Core Update has finished rolling out, taking 19 days to complete. Initial observations suggest a mixed bag of results, with some websites experiencing positive ranking changes while others saw negative impacts.

data.Title: OpenAI's SearchGPT: Early User Feedback and Comparisons to Google
data.Description: OpenAI's SearchGPT, a prototype AI-powered search tool, is being evaluated by early users. While showing potential, it faces challenges with shopping and local queries, and concerns about accuracy and potential for generating false information.

data.Title: Google Search UI Updates: Forum Results, Shopping Features, and More
data.Description: Google is testing a new search UI for forum results, featuring top comments and related discussions. Additionally, Google Ads introduces a "Merchant products" image tab and automatic linking of Google Ads and Merchant Center accounts.
